name: Plumas Pines Private Residences
description: Plumas Pines Private Residences offer vacation homes and cabins nestled in the Graeagle golf community. Walk-out access to Plumas Pines Golf Course with full kitchens, decks, and mountain serenity.
shortDescription: Vacation homes and cabins in the Graeagle golf community with walk-out course access.
highlights: Walk-out access to Plumas Pines Golf Course
Near Graeagle Meadows and Whitehawk Ranch

roomTypes.name: 2-Bedroom Cabin
roomTypes.description: Cozy cabin with full kitchen and mountain views.

roomTypes.name: 3-Bedroom Home
roomTypes.description: Spacious home for golf groups of 6.

roomTypes.name: 4-Bedroom Estate
roomTypes.description: Large estate perfect for big golf groups.

faqs.question: Can you walk to the golf course?
faqs.answer: Yes — residences are on or adjacent to Plumas Pines Golf Course.

faqs.question: What other courses are nearby?
faqs.answer: Graeagle Meadows, Whitehawk Ranch, and Nakoma are all within 15-20 minutes.

meta.title: Plumas Pines Private Residences Graeagle | Golf Lodging
meta.description: Vacation homes on Plumas Pines Golf Course in Graeagle. Full kitchens, mountain views, and custom golf packages.
